description: Stylistic geometrics & swirls within vert. Stripes 1\" x 5.5\" wide. Pastel coral, periwinkle, cream, gold on white Bisquit
dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 81 1/2 x 55 1/4 in. (207.01 x 140.34 cm)
text: Geometric motifs and patterns comprise one of the largest categories of design elements used in the creation of African textiles. In <I>Caravan<I>, Swedish designer Anita Askild captures the improvisational quality often present in the African aesthetic. The seemingly random placement of forms and colors combines with variations in size and orientation in a way that encourages the eye to move across the fabric in much the same way that traditional <I>Kuba<I> design does.
title: Caravan
